{"id":361187014,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 years, 1 month","timestamp":1593710239,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"12 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/361187014/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"14.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int trap(vector<int>& height) {\n        if (height.size() == 0) return 0; \n        int leftMax=0;\n        int rightMax =0;\n        int left =0;\n        int right =height.size()-1;\n        int ans=0;\n        while(left<right){\n            leftMax =max(leftMax,height[left]);\n            rightMax =max(rightMax,height[right]);\n            if(leftMax<rightMax){\n                ans+=leftMax-height[left];\n                left++;\n            }\n            else{\n                ans +=rightMax-height[right];\n                right--;\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water"}
